suggestions.name: Tuna Avocado Wrap
suggestions.description: A quick and satisfying wrap filled with tuna, creamy avocado, and fresh vegetables.
instructions: Drain the canned tuna and place in a bowl
Mash the avocado and mix with the tuna
Add lemon juice, salt, and pepper to the mixture
Lay out the tortilla and add the tuna-avocado mixture
Top with chopped lettuce and sliced tomato
Roll up the tortilla tightly and cut in half if desired

suggestions.name: Quinoa Chicken Bowl
suggestions.description: A nutritious bowl with quinoa, grilled chicken, and vegetables for a balanced lunch.
instructions: Place cooked quinoa in a bowl as the base
Slice the grilled chicken breast and arrange on top of quinoa
Add spinach, halved cherry tomatoes, and diced cucumber
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice

suggestions.name: Greek Yogurt Protein Plate
suggestions.description: A no-cook protein-packed lunch plate with Greek yogurt, nuts, and fruit.
instructions: Spoon Greek yogurt into a bowl or plate
Slice the banana and arrange on top of the yogurt
Sprinkle almonds and blueberries over the yogurt and banana
Drizzle with honey and dust with cinnamon
